definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to come as no surprise/as expected
in the unseen world of spirits/mysteriously and inexorably

pinyin: yu4 guan3 li3 Yu2 fu2 wu4 zhi1 zhong1

definition: a general planning in the seclusion of his tent is able to determine the outcome of the distant battle (idiom)
pinyin: yun4 chou2 wei2 wo4 zhi1 zhong1 , jue2 sheng4 qian1 li3 zhi1 wai4
containing_words.word: 運籌帷幄之中，決勝千里之外

sentences.english: Spanish unemployment soared, and the budget went into deep deficit.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙失業率飛速上升，預算陷入深深的赤字之中。

sentences.english: The summit of the mountain is lost in the cloud and mist.
Significant micro- and macro-adjustments are in the works.
sentences.chinese: 微觀面和宏觀面的重大調整仍在進行之中。

sentences.english: May Amma Bhagavan's blessing bring love and joy into your Relationships.
sentences.chinese: 願阿媽和巴格萬的祝福把愛和喜悅帶入你的關係之中。

sentences.english: When the police arrived, they sent Chen to hospital. After intensive rescue, Chen is still in coma.
sentences.chinese: 經醫院搶救，陳勇軍目前仍處於昏迷之中。

sentences.english: The Rooks Holiday Hotel, Mae Hong Son is set in the midst of a fascinating valley in Northern Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 茹克思假日飯店坐落在泰國北部一處迷人的山谷之中。

sentences.english: And it is this belief that leads us to include these arts in the school curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 正是這個觀點，我們將藝術襄括進了學校課程之中。

sentences.english: But they were uttered only within his imagination.
sentences.chinese: 其實只是在他的想象之中發出了聲。

sentences.english: China's biological resources are among the world's richest.
sentences.chinese: 中國生物資源是在最富有之中在世界上。

sentences.english: When he notices for the first time the faint.
sentences.chinese: 他第一次在圓形杯底的折射之中。

sentences.english: My house is among the hills.
sentences.chinese: 我的房子掩映在小山之中。

sentences.english: Sometimes you can almost see the plan.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，你似乎可以知道哪些冥冥之中的註定。

sentences.english: Currently, the function of SEF14 fimbriae is still being analysised.
sentences.chinese: 目前，關於SEF14菌毛的功能仍在探討之中。

sentences.english: Their arms factory lies in range of high mountains.
sentences.chinese: 他們的武器工廠坐落在羣山峻嶺之中。

sentences.english: Analysis of the Non-linear Relationship between Sci-tech Progress and Social Development;
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，非政治性的勢力也在發展之中。

sentences.english: Each line, inadvertently are bathed in flowers.
sentences.chinese: 每行一處，不經意間便沐浴在了花香之中。

definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to hit the target/to hit the nail on the head
China Times (newspaper)/abbr. for 中國時報|中国时报 [Zhong1 guo2 Shi2 bao4]
in (some place)/to be in (adversity, a difficult situation, danger, turmoil etc)/to find oneself in/placed in/surrounded by
to sink into/to get caught up in/to land in (a predicament)
in between/within that interval/in the meantime
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
Zhongdu, capital of China during the Jin Dynasty (1115-1234), modern day Beijing
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
caught in (a bad situation)/to fall into (trap etc)
